info.name: Pennsylvania Rush
info.attribution:
The room layout, game design, and card designs are by LawDawg96 and released to the Public Domain by CC0.

The boy and girl shapes and the wood background are from Pixabay and are available under the Pixabay license at:
  - https://pixabay.com/vectors/kids-black-boy-silhouette-girl-303544/
  - https://pixabay.com/photos/wood-boards-texture-wooden-brown-1846849/

The wagon, barrel, plow, and pump icons are CC BY 3.0 by Delapouite and available at:
 
  - https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/old-wagon.html
  - https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/barrel.html
  - https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/plow.html
  - https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/windpump.html
info.description: Use deck of 40 cards in 4 suit colors and 2 genders. Play cards in ascending order and color into common piles. Earn points for playing cards and lose points for remaining cards. Most points wins.
info.helpText: Players take seats. Press play button. Players use area around own seat for playing, but holders on top half of screen are common holders for stacking same-colored piles in increasing value. In case more than one player tries to use a pile at the same time, only the first card will be accepted. The text label and outline color of the holder will show the successful player. The other player must manually return their card back to the proper location. Press play button again to auto calculate score and start next round.

fields.text: You should only use this option if the board is gridlocked and no plays can be made. Selecting Go will move the bottom card of the stack to the top so that different cards will be revealed during the flip 3 process. Select Go to perform this action or Cancel to abort.
You are about to reset the board  Are you sure?
You are about to start the next round.  This will calculate scores and set up the board for play. Are you sure?

You should only use this option if the board is gridlocked and no plays can be made. Selecting Go will move the bottom card of the stack to the top so that different cards will be revealed during the flip 3 process. Select Go to perform this action or Cancel to abort.
